Hi

On Wed 26-Feb-2003 at 09:35:07AM -0500, Walden Mathews wrote:
> >
> > Really? which HTTP status code is a logout?
> 
> 401 UNAUTHORIZED, as said above.

Oops, sorry :-(

I still don't understand how after sending a 401 you can get a web
browser to re-prompt the user for the username and password? I've
never managed to achieve this.

Chris
